title: A1706 Does not come out of Sleep
message:

Thanks

title: A1706 Does not come out of Sleep

Possibly Hall sensors problem.
Any history available?
What is the 820-x code of your board?

title: A1706 Does not come out of Sleep
message: Customer has only phoned in so don't have board with me, could dirt around the SMC cause this issue?
